column1: qqq: Data refer to 2015 or the most recent year available.aaaa: Updated by HDRO using Barro and Lee (2016) estimates.yyy: Based on data from ICF Macro Demographic and Health Surveys for 2006-2015.vvv: Updated by HDRO based on data from UNESCO Institute for Statistics (2016)xxx: Based on data from UNICEF's Multiple Indicator Cluster Surveys 2006-2015.zzz: Updated by HDRO based on Syrian Center for Policy Research (2016).,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,
